oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: News Of The World excerpt - Grand Ole Opry stars in Wiesbaden, Germany
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpt from NBC program News Of The World. Ed Hocker talks with Minnie Pearl, Roy Acuff, Red Foley, and Rod Brasfield about the Grand Ole Opry cast tour in Wiesbaden, Germany.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer introduces Ed Hocker -- Ed Hocker talks about the Grand Ole Opry cast tour -- Minnie Pearl talks -- Roy Acuff talks -- Red Foley talks -- Rod Brasfield talks -- Announcer introduces the next news item
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; News of the world (Radio program); Minnie Pearl; Acuff, Roy; Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Brasfield, Rod; Grand ole opry (Radio program)
